meanings.definition: A small, circular adhesive patch that changes color to indicate changes in body temperature.
meanings.sent1: I wore a biodot on my arm to see if I had a fever.
meanings.sent2: The biodot on her forehead turned blue when she got cold.
meanings.sent3: The biodot on the cat's belly showed it was warmer than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her biodot was like a tiny mood ring for her body temperature.
meanings.sent5: The biodot's color change was like a secret message from my skin.

meanings.definition: To apply a biodot to the skin to monitor temperature changes.
meanings.sent1: She will biodot her wrist before going for a run.
meanings.sent2: I biodot my forehead to keep track of my body heat.
meanings.sent3: He biodots his arm before every workout, just in case.
meanings.sent4: Biodotting her neck, she was ready to monitor her temperature.
meanings.sent5: They biodot their cheeks to ensure they stay cool during the hike.
